item.title: In the Wake of Scala Days 2015
item.description: Scala Days Amsterdam conference was full of interesting topics so in this post I’ll cover talks on the Scala platform, core concepts for making Scala code more idiomatic, monad transformers, consistency in distributed systems, distributed domain driven design, and a little more.
